H3.text: who did the us share the oregon country with. British

A4.text: The Anglo-American Convention of 1818 established joint occupancy of the Oregon Country by the United States and the United Kingdom.

A5.text: The Oregon Treaty of 1846 divided the Oregon Country between the United States and the United Kingdom along the 49th parallel.
